    • Method Detail

      • build

        public org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration build()
                                      throws SQLException,
                                             IOException,
                                             lucee.runtime.exp.PageException
        Build out Hibernate configuration using the application's `this.ormSettings`, datasource, and generated mappings.
        Parameters:
        log - Lucee logger object, configured for the ORM log
        mappings - Mapping XML document as a string
        ds - Datasource to operate on
        user - Username for the configured datasource
        pass - Password for the configured datasource
        data - The extension SessionFactoryData
        applicationName - Application name
        Returns:
        Hibernate Configuration object
        Throws:
        SQLException
        IOException
        lucee.runtime.exp.PageException
